Description: true: use AXI voltage values as input; false: use PL voltage values as input
true: load simulation; false: fix PMSM speed
load torque if simulate_mechanical is true
fixed speed if simulate_mechanical is false
set machine parameters; description see "uz_pmsm_model9ph_dq_config_t" struct
input voltages as transformed values in the form of "uz_9ph_dq_t" from AXI
input voltages as transformed values in the form of "uz_9ph_dq_t" from PL
actual currents in the rotary or stationary reference frame to AXI in the for of "uz_9ph_dq_t"
actual currents in the rotary or stationary reference frame to PL in the for of "uz_9ph_dq_t"
feedback actual input voltages to AXI (available for use_axi_input true and false)
